root.name: David Beckham Soccer
root.description: OverviewDavid Beckham Soccer is a soccer game developed by Rage Software (Game Boy Color, Xbox, Playstation, and Playstation 2 versions) and Yoyo Entertainment (Game Boy Advance version). David Beckham Soccer was published by Rage Software (European Xbox, Playstation, Playstation 2, and Game Boy Advance versions), and Majesco Games (US Versions and European Game Boy Color version).
